name: @dreamlab-ai/webvowl-wasm
description: High-performance WASM implementation of WebVOWL built with wasm-js

scripts.build: rm -rf pkg && wasm-js build --release --out-dir pkg && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('pkg/package.json', JSON.stringify({name:'webvowl-wasm',version:'0.3.4',description:'WebVOWL WASM physics engine built with wasm-js',main:'webvowl_wasm.js',module:'webvowl_wasm.js',types:'webvowl_wasm.d.ts',type:'module',sideEffects:['webvowl_wasm.js'],files:['webvowl_wasm.js','webvowl_wasm_bg.js','webvowl_wasm.d.ts']},null,2))"

author: WebVOWL Contributors
